title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions:
**Experience the Ultimate in Timekeeping with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch (Model: 98B406)**

Elevate your style and precision with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, a stunning addition to any collection. This watch is not just a timepiece; it's a statement of elegance and functionality.

**Key Features:**

- **Gold-Tone Stainless Steel Case:** Crafted with precision and durability, the gold-tone stainless steel case gives this watch a timeless appeal. Perfect for both formal and casual occasions.
  
- **Black Unidirectional Timing Bezel with Gold-Tone Accents:** The black bezel with gold-tone accents adds a touch of luxury and functionality, making it ideal for tracking laps or timing events.

- **Domed Mineral Crystal:** This crystal offers exceptional clarity and scratch resistance, ensuring your watch stays pristine and visible under any condition.

- **Water Resistance to 100 Meters:** Whether you're navigating through rain or splashing in the pool, this watch can handle it all without a second thought.

- **Black Sunburst Dial with Gold-Tone and Silver-Tone Accents:** The black sunburst dial with its gold-tone and silver-tone accents provides a striking contrast, making it easy to read at a glance.

- **Luminescent Hands and Markers:** In low light conditions, the watch remains functional and legible, ensuring you're always on time.

- **6-Hand Chronograph and Calendar Display:** With a chronograph, 24-hour display, and calendar, this watch offers a comprehensive set of functions to keep you organized and on track.

- **Gold-Tone Stainless Steel Bracelet:** The curved and faceted links of the bracelet provide a comfortable and stylish fit, while the sport foldover closure ensures a secure and adjustable fit.

**Why Choose the Marine Star Gold Chronograph?**

- Perfect for the modern gentleman who demands style and precision.
- Ideal for outdoor enthusiasts and professionals who need to keep track of time and events.
- A versatile watch that can complement any outfit, from casual to formal.

**Invest in Timeless Elegance with the Bulova Marine Star Gold Chronograph.** It's more than just a watch; it's a fashion statement. Elevate your style and functionality with this exquisite timepiece.
